Entry.JapaneseText: ランドグリーズの遺跡
ランドグリーズの遺跡
<voice:36000017>ふははは……最高の気分だ！ ヒューマの叫びが聞こえる！ ヒューマの苦しみが見える！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000017>Hahahaha! This is the best! Hearing the sounds of their screams! Witnessing their torment first-hand!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000018>気に食わんヒューマどもを 痛めつける事ほど 愉快な事はない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000018>I'm telling you, there's no greater joy than inflicting pain upon these repulsive Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000019>ああ、そうだ……もっと…… もっとやるんだ、トーマ…… ヒューマを殺せ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000019>Yes, that's right...more... Keep going, Tohma! Kill the Huma!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001a>……何を言っている…… やめろ……
<voice:300000be>だが今こそ、我らヒューマが この国の覇権を握る時だ！ いまわしきガジュマは 我々の前にひれ伏すがよい！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:300000BE>But now more than ever, the time has come for we Huma to take control of this kingdom! The inferior Gajuma will grovel beneath our feet!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001b>愚かなヒューマめ！ 貴様らこそ、我らガジュマの 下僕となるべく生まれた存在だ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001B>Foolish Huma! It is you who will come to realize that you were born to serve us Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001c>上も下もない…… ヒューマとガジュマは同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>…… 等しい存在だ……
<voice:3600001d>何を言う？ ガジュマこそ優れた種。 上に立つべき存在ではないか！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001D>What are you talking about? We Gajuma are the superior species! Does that not give us the right to stand above them?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600001e>おまえもそうだろう。 ヒューマたちを従えて、 ぞろぞろ歩いているではないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600001E>You feel the same way, don't you? Conquering the Huma would still allow us all to live in the same world, right?
<voice:3600001F>No... That's not how I feel at all!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000005>あんたが何をしているかには興味はない。 だが、そうしてヒューマと共にいる事は あんたのためにはなるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000005>I have no interest in whatever it is that you're up to. However, parading around with these Huma will bring you no good.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000009>……道はふたつにひとつ。 我らのように他を寄せつけぬか、 主従の関係を作るか。
<voice:36000020>ドバルの言うとおりだ…… ヒューマどもとの共存など、 しょせん不可能なのだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000020>Doval is right. Co-existing with Huma has never been a real possibility!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000021>ヒューマを支配しろ…… それを拒むヒューマどもは殺せ…… ヒューマに生きる価値などない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000021>We must subjugate them...and kill those who refuse to submit! Huma have no worth as living beings!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000022>それは違う…… 互いの違いを認め、理解し合えば、 共に歩む事ができるはずだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000022>You're wrong. If we work towards mutual understanding while still recognizing our differences, there should be no reason why we can't live together in peace!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000085>溝を埋める気などさらさらない。 ヒューマを根絶やしにしてしまえば、 溝などなくなるのだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000085>We have no intention of widening anything. All we need to do is eradicate these Huma, and then there won't be any gulf to worry about!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b000086>な、何が根絶やしだ！ それはこっちの台詞だ！ やれるもんなら、やってみろ！ 我らが同胞が黙っておらんぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B000086>W-what do you mean “eradicate?!” That's OUR job! If you think you can destroy us, then go ahead and try it! My brethren and I won't go down so easily!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000023>滅べ……滅べ、ヒューマども！ おまえたちが滅べば争いは無くなるのだ！ みんな滅んでしまえ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000023>Perish...perish, you worthless Huma! If we get rid of you, then there will finally be peace in this world! Perish, all of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000024>……恐ろしい事を…… 俺は……俺はこんな事…… 考えてはいない……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000024>Such horrifying thoughts... How could I...ever be like this? This is not who I am!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000025>ああ……なんて醜いの…… ガジュマの、ガジュマの身体が こんなに醜いなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000025>Ugh...how hideous! To think that anything could be as ugly as this... ...As a Gajuma's body!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000026>返して…… 私の本当の身体を返して……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000026>Give it back! Give me back my real body!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000027>醜いのはヒューマのほうだ！ おまえには、醜いヒューマの 身体がお似合いだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000027>Huma are the ugly ones! A disgusting Huma body is fitting for someone like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000028>……今すぐその身体を 陛下にお返ししろ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000028>Return that body to Her Majesty at once!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2b0000af>ガジュマとヒューマの共存社会を 取り戻すためなら、 私はどんな手段も辞さない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2B0000AF>If it means the return of a stability in which Huma and Gajuma can coexist, then there is no method too extreme.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002b>ガジュマとヒューマの共存など、 まやかしに過ぎん！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002B>The peaceful co-existence between Huma and Gajuma is just a fairytale!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002c>ヒューマと共に生きる事など できるものか……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002C>Do you really think that we could ever stand to live together with the likes of Huma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002d>今まで、そうやって来た！ できるはずだ……！ できないはずがない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002D>We've already come this far doing exactly that! It's more than possible! There's no reason why we can't!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002e>その結果の、この争いなのだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002E>Co-existence is what led to the world's current problems, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600002f>だが、誰も争いたくはないはずだ…… 思いが同じならば…… いつか、それはかなうはず……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600002F>But I don't believe that most people truly desire conflict. If everyone wants peace, then someday...it should become a reality.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000030>なんて……なんて美しいの…… これがヒューマの身体…… やっと手にいれたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000030>Such beauty...such grace. This Huma body... I have finally obtained such a treasure!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000031>あなたはガジュマの誇りを捨て、 醜きヒューマに 成り下がってしまった……!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000031>You have thrown away your pride as a Gajuma, and degraded yourself by taking on the foul appearance of a Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000032>誰もが迷いを抱え、生きている。 そうした迷いがあるからこそ、 人は成長できるのではないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000032>Everyone loses their way in life sometimes. If someone didn't, then how could they ever grow as a person?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000033>我々は迷える女王などいらない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000033>We have no use for a conflicted Queen.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000034>ガジュマの身体に 誇りを持てない者など、 もはや女王ではありえない！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000034>A person who is unable to show pride in her Gajuma self is unfit to be Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000035>陛下はまだお若い…… いつか……わかってくださる…… わかってくださるはずだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000035>Her Majesty is still young. Someday...she'll learn. She'll have to learn...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000036>いやっ!! ガジュマに触られたくないの!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000036>Stop! I don't want your filthy Gajuma hands touching me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000037>わたしに……近寄らないで…… 来ないで……来ないでッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000037>Don't...don't come near me... Get away...get away!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000038>ガジュマなんかに…… ガジュマなんかに 助けてもらいたくない……！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000038>I don't need... I don't need help from the likes of a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000039>ああ、俺だっておまえのような ヒューマの小娘を助けるなど まっぴらだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000039>Right, and I'll be damned if I ever offer a hand to some little Huma brat like you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003b>内心、小娘の逆恨みに、 イライラしていたのだろう？ 死なないなら……殺してやれとな！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003B>Admit it. You despise her for her petty misplaced sense of revenge, don't you? You were planning to kill her if she didn't die first!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003c>やめろ！ 何を言うんだ……！ やめろ……！
<voice:3600003d>……俺はヒューマが憎い…… 身勝手で傲慢なヒューマが憎い……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003D>I despise Huma... I despise such arrogant and selfish beings!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003e>ヒューマは……ヒューマなど、 この手で滅ぼしてやる!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003E>I... I will destroy them with my own two hands!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600003f>脆弱なヒューマめ!! 消えろ！ 消えてしまえ!! うおおおおおおぉぉぉッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600003F>Pathetic Huma weaklings! Die! Begone from this world! Uwaaagh!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000040>俺の心の内側に……確かにある…… ヒューマへの憎しみや怒りが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000040>Deep inside myself... There really is some trace of hatred and rage toward the Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000041>そうだ、おまえの中には 激しい憎悪が渦巻いている。
<voice:36000042>それなのに、なぜおまえは ヒューマへの攻撃をためらう!? なぜだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000042>And yet in spite of that, why do you hesitate to strike at them? Answer me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000043>……俺は……俺は…… ああああああぁぁぁぁッ……!!
<voice:36000045>おぬしの心は いつも揺らいでおる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000045>A storm rages deep within your heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000046>いっそ、ヒューマが憎いとする その心を受け入れたほうが 楽なのではないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000046>Would it not be easier to simply let yourself succumb to the hatred?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000048>ならば、ワシの力など 必要あるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000048>Then you have no need for my power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000049>……誰でも、多かれ少なかれ、 他人に対して嫌悪や憎悪を 隠し持って生きています。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000049>...Everyone, to some degree or another, goes through life harboring feelings of disgust and hatred towards others.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004a>しかし、我々には、 そんな負の感情を打ち消す 信頼や友情といった心の力が……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004A>However, the heart has the power to foster trust and friendship which negates those negative feelings...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600004c>私がここまで来られたのは、 種族を越えた<Cyan>「絆」<White>が あったからです。
<voice:3600004d>私は信じたい。 すべての人々に種族を越えた <Cyan>「絆」<White>がある事を。
<voice:3600004f>それを悪意で歪める者があらば、 私はその悪を取り除きたい。 彼らと……仲間と共に。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600004F>And if there are people out there whose minds have been warped by malice, then I want to erase that malice from their hearts. Together with them...with my friends!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000050>聖獣ランドグリーズ…… 私はあなたの力を求める。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000050>Sacred Beast Randgritz... I ask that you grant me your strength!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000051>ほっほっほっほっ……完敗だ。 おぬしと仲間たちとの<Cyan>「絆」<White>、 しかと、受け止めたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000051>Hohohoho... you have emerged victorious. I am thoroughly convinced of the <Cyan>bonds<White> that you share with your comrades.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000052>フォルスキューブを出すがよい。 ワシの力を与えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000052>Present your Force. My power is yours.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000054>やったネ!! これで、聖獣の力が 全部そろったヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000054>Hey, we did it! Now we've assembled the powers of all six Sacred Beasts!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000055>ゲオルギアスの思念を 浄化できるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000055>Now we can purge the world of Geyorkias' will, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000057>その前に聞かせてくれ。 聖獣はなぜ、オレたちに 浄化の力を与えてくれたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000057>I have something I need to ask. Why have the Sacred Beasts granted us, of all people, their powers in order to complete this task?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000058>うむ…… もっともな疑問だな……
<voice:36000059>……かつて、ガジュマとヒューマは、 種族ごとに分かれて暮らし、 別々の道を歩んでいた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000059>Long ago, Gajuma and Huma lived separately in this world, choosing not to cross paths.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005a>しかし、文明を急速に 発達させたヒューマは、 ガジュマを支配下に置こうと、 戦いを仕掛けた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005A>Eventually the Huma, who had rapidly began to develop modern civilization, attempted to subjugate the Gajuma under their rule. Thus, a war ensued.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005b>我らの王ゲオルギアスは、 ヒューマがこの世界自体を 揺るがす脅威になると考え、 ヒューマを滅ぼす事を決意した。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005B>Our King, Geyorkias, felt that the Huma would become a threat to the balance of this world and set out to destroy them.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005c>だが、ワシを含む 六聖獣は反対した。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005C>...The six Sacred Beasts, myself included, defied him.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600005d><Yellow>ヒト<White>同士の対立もまた、 自然の営みであり、そこに 我ら聖獣が介入すべきでないと……
<voice:3600005e>そして、聖獣王ゲオルギアスと 六つの聖獣は袂を分かち、 戦う事となってしまった。 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の戦いも続いておった。
<voice:3600005f>長い長い戦いの末、 我らは聖獣王との戦いに勝利し、 ようやく事態は収まった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600005F>At the end of the long and seemingly endless war, we Sacred Beasts gained victory over our King, and at last the storm had passed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000060>その戦いの影響で大地は疲弊し、 もはや、ヒューマにもガジュマを 支配する力は残っていなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000060>The war had severely ravaged this land, and in the end neither Huma nor Gajuma had any power left to try and gain dominance.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000061>そして、今……思念が満ち、 ヒューマとガジュマが争い、 憎しみ合っておる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000061>Yet now... An evil will has enveloped the world, and Huma and Gajuma are once again on the brink of a great conflict.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000062>ヒューマを滅ぼそうという 王の考えが正しかったのではないか という意見も出始めておる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000062>Some of us had begun to wonder if perhaps King Geyorkias' plan to eliminate the Huma was not the correct course of action after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000063>あの時、ヒューマが滅びておれば、 このような争いが再び起こる事は なかったからのう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000063>If the Huma had been vanquished so long ago, then the problems of our current time would not have occurred.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000064>おぬしらは力を求めた。 それは、ふたつの種族を 共存に導こうという希望の光。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000064>You all sought power. That power could become a ray of hope that would guide the two races down the path of peace.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000065>その希望が我らの力を得、 種族の共存を勝ち得たならば、 それでよし。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000065>If you are able to use such power to foster harmony and co-existence between both races, then that is all I can ask for.
<voice:36000066>Should your efforts be in vain, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000067>ヒューマが滅んでも 仕方がない、という事か……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000067>...Then you'll have no choice but to eradicate the Huma, is that it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000068>うむ……我らは、おぬしらに すべてを託す事にした。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000068>Yes... We have decided to entrust everything to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000069>そして、おぬしらは 我ら聖獣の課した試練に 見事打ち勝ち、力を得た。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000069>And every one of you has been able to overcome the trials we Sacred Beasts set out before you with grace and dignity, thus earning our power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600006a>さあ、我が光のもとへ集まるがよい。 それぞれの力と思いを…… ひとつにするのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600006A>Now then, gather round and assemble your strength. Each of your powers and thoughts...will become one.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><Eugene>は 奥義『迅雷天翔撃』が 習得可能になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><Eugene> can now learn the Fusion Force "Thunder Descent".

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000003>こんなところにいちゃあ、 確かめようもないぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000003>We probably won't know for sure until we get out of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000006>まさか…… あの薬は効いてなかったのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000006>You're kidding me... That medicine we gave you had no effect?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000007>効き目はあったが…… 充分ではなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000007>No, it worked to some extent... But not completely.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000008>だが、おまえたちの気持ちが、 俺の心を鎮めてくれた……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000008>It was your friendship that was able to calm my soul in the end.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000009>ここまで…… ここまでずっと耐えてきたの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000009>You... You have been enduring it this entire time?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700000b>なんて人なの…… 驚きを通り越してあきれたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700000B>Now that's some mettle! I really shouldn't be surprised at this point...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700000d>……もう大丈夫だ…… 心配かけたな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700000D>I'm fine... Sorry to make you worry.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000010>まあまあ、<Mao>。 よかったじゃねえか。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000010>Aww, <Mao>. It's a good thing, ain't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000011>うん、そうだよネ…… そうだよネ……
<voice:37000012>すべては、終わったようだ。 よく耐えたのう、<Eugene>よ。
<voice:37000014>私たちが、直接この世界に 関わるのは、ここまでだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000014>This is the last time that we will be directly in contact with this world.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000015>もう会えないの？ 聖獣の力はどうなっちゃうの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000015>So we can't ever see you guys again? What'll happen to all of your powers?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000016><Mao>…… 本来、聖獣は<Yellow>ヒト<White>の社会に 干渉すべきではないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000016><Mao>... Sacred Beasts were never truly meant to interfere with the affairs of mortals.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000018>これ以上、<Yellow>ヒト<White>の世界に 関わるわけにはいきません。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000018>It would not be right for us to get involved with this world any longer.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000019>もう少しだけ、<Veigue>たちと 一緒に旅してみようかと 思っていたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000019>I would love to be able to travel with <Veigue> and his friends just a little longer...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700001b>はいはい、わかりました。 じゃあ、<Veigue>、みんな、 元気でね！
<voice:3700001f>まずはここから出て、 世の中がどうなったのか 確かめてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700001F>First we need to leave this place and see what really happened out there.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000007>ワシは聖獣ランドグリーズ…… 「地」すなわち大地を司る者である。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000007>I am the Sacred Beast Randgritz... I am the guardian of this vast land.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000009>正確に言うならば、 おぬしらの目の前におるのは、 ワシの精神体だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000009>Strictly speaking, what you see before you is not my true form. It is merely my spirit given shape.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000a>ワシの身体はとうの昔に滅び、 サニイタウンの土台となった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000A>My true body was destroyed long ago, and eventually became the foundation upon which Sunnytown now stands.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000b>聖獣の身体が街の土台？ じゃあ、<Blue>幻の島<White>というのは、 あんた自身の事なのか!?
<voice:3600000c>いかにも……ワシは散歩好きでな。 かつてはカレギアの海を 泳ぎまわったものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000C>Indeed, and I love nothing more than a good stroll, you know. In the past, I would swim the vast seas of Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000d>その際、時折、海面からのぞく ワシの背中を見て、 人々は島だと思ったようだ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000D>In those days, people looking out to sea would glimpse my back protruding from the water's surface and occasionally mistake it for an island...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000e>ワシの説明はそのくらいにして、 本題に入るとしよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000E>But that is enough explanation from me. Let us move on to the matter at hand.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3600000f>すまぬが、<Eugene>とワシを 二人にさせてもらうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3600000f>Pardon me, but I shall have you all leave <Eugene> and I alone for the time being.
<voice:36000010><Eugene>... You have finally made it this far.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000011>力を欲する理由も、決意の強さも、 おぬしがここに至った事実をもって、 証明されたと言えよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000011>One could say that the very fact that you made it here is enough to give merit to the strength of your resolve, and the reasons you seek my power.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000013>だが、おぬしら<Yellow>ヒト<White>は、 もろき生き物だ。 すぐに、たやすき方へと流される。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000013><Yellow>People<White>, however, are feeble beings. You are quick to succumb to moments of weakness.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000014>思念に取りつかれ、 ヒューマ憎しとなったおぬしなら わかるであろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000014>You, who grew hatred for Huma in you heart once you were exposed to the evil will should understand that quite well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000015>そのような弱き<Yellow>ヒト<White>に、 ワシの力を与える事には 少なからず不安を覚える。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000015>I must admit that I feel a significant sense of unease when I think about granting my power to <Yellow>one<White> as weak as you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000016>ゆえに、今後もおぬしが その強き心を持ち続ける事が できるかどうか、 ワシに見せてもらいたい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000016>Therefore, I ask that you show me whether or not your strength of heart is something that you will be able to maintain.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
